item.title: Bank Customer Churn Prediction
item.description: Data Analysis on bank customer data to predict reasons for customer churn out and provide suggestions to prevent this. Dataset : Churn_Modelling.csv Number of records: 10,000 Number of features: 14 Libraries used: pandas, matplotlib,numpy, seaborn Link to GitHub Repository
